text:
@nedprice @JoyAnnReid If you STILL support Democrats & Pelosi you’re either ignorant of the facts or rich & don’t care that our govt is working against working people. Pelosi's latest coronavirus bill would bail out corporate lobbyists.
https://t.co/KsNTpFHvyS
